Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Bludgeon:::

::Bludgeon is in his quaters, planning to leave.  He takes one last look 
around and remembers.  He arrived during a huge battle between the Predacons 
and the Chosen Ones.  He proved to be a strong warrior throughout his career. 
 But also he realized that he was nothing but a subordinate.  And with 
Obsidian dead, he didn't see much of a cause for continuing. He walks out of 
the base, activates his jets, and starts flying out into space, back to 
Cybertron::

--part1_7b.148e14fd.282e164a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR> But also he realized that he was nothing but a subordinate.  And with
